title: Rock N Roll Is Dead
lyrics:

Naw fuck it dawg

I've been on the fucking road

Ugh

That kickback light

Gone with the sauce
Got the .45 tucked in the bag
Hit 'em with the hawk
Naw fuck it dawg

I've been on the fucking road

No kicker

Truth!
